description: This file defines a class 'FileTools' that provides file management utilities such as saving, reading, listing, and searching files within a specified directory. It extends a 'Toolkit' class and utilizes logging functions for debugging and error reporting.

classes.name: FileTools
classes.description: A utility class for file operations such as save, read, list, and search within a directory.

methods.name: save_file
methods.description: Saves contents to a specified file, creating directories if needed, and handles overwriting.

methods.name: read_file
methods.description: Reads and returns the contents of a specified file.

methods.name: list_files
methods.description: Returns a JSON-formatted list of all files in the base directory.

methods.name: search_files
methods.description: Searches for files matching a pattern within the base directory and returns matching file paths.
